abstract: Intel downplays its Viiv brand for chips after no one found its home entertainment ideas much fun.
snippet: Intel downplays its Viiv brand for chips after no one found its home entertainment ideas much fun.
lead_paragraph: There were two things wrong with Intel’s Viiv brand: First, it was almost impossible to figure out what it meant. And second, what it did mean wasn’t worth much and was hardly related to chips.

headline.main: Intel Loses Its Will to Viiv
